ZAYASAIKHAN SAMBUU:
Sweet on You, 2022
Acrylic on canvas — 80 × 67 cm
PURCHASE / INQUIRE
$ 8,000
About the artwork:

Sugary tones and affectionate motifs entwine, inviting reflection on modern sweetness amid global influences, in Sambuu’s energetic style.

About the artist:

Zayasaikhan Sambuu’s vibrant paintings fuse pop culture with Mongolian traditions, using candy-like colors and playful motifs to explore themes of consumerism, identity, and modern life. His works balance bold graphic elements with subtle cultural commentary, creating energetic compositions that invite viewers to reflect on global influences through a whimsical lens.

Zayasaikhan Sambuu was born in 1975 in Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia, and lives and works there. He received his education at the Mongolian University of Arts and Culture.
